readable.title: 1295671216_cde1b9c9d1
readable.content: A crowd of people are standing together on a sidewalk , while one man is taking a picture . A guy in a blue sweatshirt taking a picture . A man in a blue sweatshirt taking a picture A person in a crowd views an electronic device . A person in jeans and a blue sweatshirt aims a camera while standing near a crowd of people .
